title: [保護義士/前線/自己！！]一click秘密錄音+錄影+定位+通知聯絡人

replies.msg:
轉發【可能可以幫到義士及前線！】

外國朋友同我講有個app叫parachute喺美國2015年開發，可以㩒一個制/Siri 就立刻通知emergency contact、email、Twitter ，同埋即時地點GPS tracking 、暗中livestream (暗黑mode,個screen係keep住黑色, 唔小心㩒個mon唔會停止錄影）。同普通livestream唔同嘅係如果上網connection無咗，livestream會停錄，但係呢個app可以繼續錄，直至有connection會《成條片無間斷》upload

最重要最重要最重要最重要最重要最重要係個video唔會停直至無電為止，儲存喺雲端，就算電話爛咗都唔會無咗,同埋會自動刪除喺電話所有相關資料，就算攞到手機都del唔到片

外國係用喺打擊犯罪同human trafficking

唔信可search iOS /google for website
我知最好係前線一齊，但係呢個都可以幫少少起碼知道義士喺邊度幾時有危險，同埋有片/錄音留底保障。如果警察無出委任證、暴力又或無講應該講嘅對白先拉人可追究

有一個月free trial 但我朋友email佢地求吓佢地免費開放俾香港人，佢地CEO喺twitter承諾係免費，只要download 咗喺settings “request personal membership” 就會send email 去佢地到，內容可參考以下

“Dear Parachute team, please can I have a personal membership to use the app? Thank you for supporting HK. We really appreciate it. “

至於係咪咁就得我等緊佢地覆但佢地同我朋友講會盡量配合快啲

更新：已覆，得咗，唔知有無用但趁未發夢之前試吓機先

https://parachute.live/app
Parachute by Parachute Labs, Inc.
https://apps.apple.com/hk/app/parachute/id999134752?l=en

—————-
以上為轉載訊息！依家所有普通市民都需要保護自己！全部人都要！
WoW
想問下點樣搵到個選項，因為apps入面見唔到
香港人選項係呢度

我都係今日一收到朋友訊息即刻下載，並申請香港人既free membership. 即日就收到parachute app既回覆啦，試用完再係度分享多啲。

———————————————————————
Your free Parachute membership for Hong Kong has been activated. Thank you for relying on Parachute for your safety. Please stay safe and email us for any assistance you may need.

Many thanks,
Parachute Concierge

已經試左一次，暫時知道有兩種方法可以開啟呢個parachute app 黎錄影+錄音+通知緊急聯絡人+定位，包括直接開個app，或者透過Siri shortcut，至於Android 用家，我研究到其他方便既方法會再分享。

1）打開parachute app：按螢幕一秒就可以activate 錄影+錄音+定位+通知緊急聯絡人。即使你即刻熄mon,成個mon 黑曬，錄影+錄音+定位仍然會繼續進行。

2）iPhone 用家可以係settings —> Siri and search —> my shortcuts 設定一個voice shortcut ，就可以聲控siri黎activate parachute 錄影+錄音+定位+通知緊急聯絡人。例如我錄音以「SOS」作為voice shortcut，只要我大叫「hey Siri SOS」，parachute app就會即刻開始錄影+錄音+定位+通知緊急聯絡人。

我頭先試既時候，個 app係會打電話（美國長途）通知我記錄入面既緊急聯絡人，之後發一個短訊給他/她，他/她可以按短訊既link 得到呢段錄影+錄音+定位。

希望大家幫推，保護前線+自己，普通市民都需要知道！

再講多次，呢個app 依家offer free membership俾香港人!!! 大家快啲下載試用+推介身邊人用！

有用post要推
今次真係外國勢力協助

我想了解多少少「香港app store限免」意思係咪讓香港人下載可以即刻免費用、唔洗send email?

replies.msg:
你下載了嗎？我最初都有唔知點用既感覺架，試過發現係簡單既。

下載之後，首先去香港人選項，選擇「request personal membership」（見下圖），然後會pop up 左你個email，你就email 他們叫他們給你free membership（可用第一個Po 既email 範本），之後等待他們回覆你個email，收到回覆之後，你再入番個app就可以用到架啦！

1）填寫緊急聯絡人（可填寫多個）
2）選擇讓parachute 可以有access to your camera，microphone同埋location
3）save 低填好既選項

得左！你只要按一下螢幕上一秒，即刻開始啟動錄音+錄影+定位追蹤，你可以熄螢幕，都唔會影響架！

Siri voice command set up 可見前面post 既介紹。

replies.msg:
係呢，認同巴/絲所講，緊急情況先用，依家出街遇到事，我地要搵自己人保護自己人，記住任何時候叉夠手機電，唯有無電（或你自己選擇結束）先會停止錄影。


推推推

香港人保護香港人

想多謝樓主同你朋友

另外諗到一樣野
依家警犬成日反對人出街
係唔係都告鳩人非法集結又暴動

即時定位同拍片 有機會變咗雙面刃 可能要注意返場合
要慎選緊急聯絡人
同埋如果之後無事發生平安的話 確認緊急聯絡人刪除晒返用過嘅短信/片比較好？&iCloud

最好提前同緊急聯絡人講一講呢樣野，費時佢哋誤以為騙案定點 亦都叫佢哋要保障返私隱
同埋大家都要留意一定一定要保障手機資料安全！
寧願做緊張大師小心為上 唔想任何一個人有事


光復香港 時代革命

Where is Parachute data stored?

By default, Parachute data is stored in a proprietary blend of storage locations, which may include the United States. Why should I trust Parachute to carry potentially controversial data?

Parachute has no affiliation with any political, economic or social cause. replies.msg:
試用咗

- APP STORE係免費下載, 唔洗乜要求限免, 比錢都係APP內比
- 冇錢可以先註冊, 再喺NEWS度REQUEST PERSONAL MEMBERSHIP, 再禁多次SAVE就等於買咗
- 就算唔需要直接通知聯絡人 (有時可能自己SEND個WTSAPP仲好)
佢起碼有個偷錄功能, 入到狗屋有乜事都有秘密錄音功用
- 如果SET咗LOCATION, IPHONE X以上可能會有"藍框", 比狗見到就唔好(偷錄失敗), 自己衝量啦
- 註冊完, 你E-MAIL會收到條LINK, 可以SHARE比朋友, 入面可以睇番你啲片 , 24個鐘後可刪
- 唔夠數據亦可以事後UPLOAD VIDEO
- IPHONE WIDGET / 3D TOUCH 可以唔入APP啓動
- 短時間內唔可以停咗再開始過, 所以完之前好諗諗係咪真係可以閂得

首先感謝手足幫手推，我自己唔係技術L （普通用家，尋日下載），不過儘量回應大家既問題，同埋我都會將你地提出既問題group 埋一次過問番app developer既。

1） 下載：係尋晚凌晨個app 已經update 左，大家唔洗再send email， 只要click一下，如果個手機位置係香港，就可以有free membership（見#404）

2） Android有無：App 負責人回覆左我既email(見下文)，暫時App developer 唔信任Android可以充份保障到大家既資料安全， 所以只係Apple 用家先用到，Android既版本只係美國本土先有得用。
“We have very serious security concerns with Android, and so, at the moment, it is only available inside the United States and only for Organizations that are part of the Parachute Platform (https://parachute.live/platform). Simply put, we cannot trust the safety of Android, especially in Hong Kong. iPhones have a much higher safety standard, and we have an excellent relationship with Apple. Apple has acknowledged Parachute's help in making the iPhone safer: "Security: We would like to acknowledge Marinos Bernitsas of Parachute for their assistance" (https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT209192)”

3） 緊急聯絡人：大家填左緊急聯絡人，記得同對方講番呢件事，係安全情況試用左先，要熟悉點樣用，但係亦唔好濫用呢個free service。

4） 熄mon唔得: 對唔住，我之前以為熄mon 用到，係唔得既！不過個app 本身會黑左你個mon，等其他人唔知道你錄緊。我會跟進下有無可能再upgrade 到即使熄mon 都得。

5） 眾籌：App developer 回覆左我關於眾籌既想法(見下文)，對方話十分願意免費提供服務給香港人，唔需要眾籌，亦唔想願意捐錢既人有任何被追蹤既風險。
“We are deeply thankful for your gesture to raise money for us providing free access. At this point, we are more than happy to provide this for free to HKers, so no need for any crowdfunding. In addition, we would be concerned that any financial transactions could end up being traced, thus creating a risk for anyone donating. So we feel that it is better to hold off at this time。”

6） 答謝：承接5，如果你想答謝App developer，可以寫app reviews, 同埋選擇唔用免費membership， 而係同世界各地其他用家一樣，先免費試用一個月，之後每個月支付月費（大約係$78一個月full version）

7） Data去左邊 ：見下文網站介紹，唔好意思，我唔識翻譯，需要技術巴絲幫手
“What encryption standards does Parachute use?
All Parachute evidence travels encrypted in a secure pipe with an RSA 2048-bit key signed by a CA. We use a CAA record to prevent unauthorized entities from issuing rogue certificates. We use SSL pinning to ensure malicious governments cannot intercept our data by issuing rogue certificates. We also use HSTS to protect against downgrade attacks. To protect against email spoofing, we sign all our emails with DKIM keys, publish an SPF record, and apply a DMARC policy of "reject" across all our email systems. Organizations have the option to set up E2E encryption, which requires both parties to set up the encryption beforehand, making the data opaque to Parachute, and thus eliminating the need to trust Parachute itself. E2E encryption is only available to organizations who would like to use it, as this feature is not desirable in the normal use case of the Parachute app.”

8) 點樣delete video/data：你自己啟用左個app 之後會收到條link, 連結去你自己錄既emergency incidents ，錄製過左24小時之後，可以開番呢條link 自己刪除事件相關資料（係自己刪除！唔係緊急聯絡人刪除），app 會back up 刪除左既 incident 資料至少30日。
“How do I delete a Parachute incident?
When you activate Parachute, we send you an email with the link to the incident, as well as a link that can be used to manage the incident. To delete the incident, just open the manage link on your phone and choose "Delete". For safety, you have to wait 24 hours before deleting an incident. We keep a backup of the deleted incident for a minimum of 30 days. If you would like the deletion of an incident managed differently, please send us an email from the address associated with your account.”

9) 有無保障：作為一個普通用家，只可以提供客觀資料給大家自行判斷，公司係美國公司，地址位於紐約，CEO 背景可見於此：https://marinosb.com/
“Parachute handles highly sensitive data from across the world every day. We take this responsibility very seriously
We never share your data with anyone but your emergency contacts
We never look at any of your data unless you ask us to
We never own your data — all data belongs to you”
詳細terms: https://parachute.live/terms

最重要最重要最重要最重要最重要最重要係個video唔會停直至無電為止，儲存喺雲端，就算電話爛咗都唔會無咗,同埋會自動刪除喺電話所有相關資料，就算攞到手機都del唔到片

外國係用喺打擊犯罪同human trafficking

唔信可search iOS /google for website
我知最好係前線一齊，但係呢個都可以幫少少起碼知道義士喺邊度幾時有危險，同埋有片/錄音留底保障。如果警察無出委任證、暴力又或無講應該講嘅對白先拉人可追究

有一個月free trial 但我朋友email佢地求吓佢地免費開放俾香港人，佢地CEO喺twitter承諾係免費，只要download 咗喺settings “request personal membership” 就會send email 去佢地到，內容可參考以下

“Dear Parachute team, please can I have a personal membership to use the app? Thank you for supporting HK. We really appreciate it. “

至於係咪咁就得我等緊佢地覆但佢地同我朋友講會盡量配合快啲

已經試左一次，暫時知道有兩種方法可以開啟呢個parachute app 黎錄影+錄音+通知緊急聯絡人+定位，包括直接開個app，或者透過Siri shortcut，至於Android 用家，我研究到其他方便既方法會再分享。

1）打開parachute app：按螢幕一秒就可以activate 錄影+錄音+定位+通知緊急聯絡人。即使你即刻熄mon,成個mon 黑曬，錄影+錄音+定位仍然會繼續進行。

2）iPhone 用家可以係settings —> Siri and search —> my shortcuts 設定一個voice shortcut ，就可以聲控siri黎activate parachute 錄影+錄音+定位+通知緊急聯絡人。例如我錄音以「SOS」作為voice shortcut，只要我大叫「hey Siri SOS」，parachute app就會即刻開始錄影+錄音+定位+通知緊急聯絡人。

我頭先試既時候，個 app係會打電話（美國長途）通知我記錄入面既緊急聯絡人，之後發一個短訊給他/她，他/她可以按短訊既link 得到呢段錄影+錄音+定位。

希望大家幫推，保護前線+自己，普通市民都需要知道！

再講多次，呢個app 依家offer free membership俾香港人!!! 大家快啲下載試用+推介身邊人用！

已經試左一次，暫時知道有兩種方法可以開啟呢個parachute app 黎錄影+錄音+通知緊急聯絡人+定位，包括直接開個app，或者透過Siri shortcut，至於Android 用家，我研究到其他方便既方法會再分享。

1）打開parachute app：按螢幕一秒就可以activate 錄影+錄音+定位+通知緊急聯絡人。即使你即刻熄mon,成個mon 黑曬，錄影+錄音+定位仍然會繼續進行。

2）iPhone 用家可以係settings —> Siri and search —> my shortcuts 設定一個voice shortcut ，就可以聲控siri黎activate parachute 錄影+錄音+定位+通知緊急聯絡人。例如我錄音以「SOS」作為voice shortcut，只要我大叫「hey Siri SOS」，parachute app就會即刻開始錄影+錄音+定位+通知緊急聯絡人。

我頭先試既時候，個 app係會打電話（美國長途）通知我記錄入面既緊急聯絡人，之後發一個短訊給他/她，他/她可以按短訊既link 得到呢段錄影+錄音+定位。

replies.msg:
你個問題好好啊，我問左app developer， 回覆重點係：
1）短既link係為左方便大家share ，一收到訊息，可以係手機/電腦/其他裝置打開條link 。係緊急既情況下，越快上到條link 越好。
2）為左避免有人撞link， 如果有人撞4次，app 既系統會即刻發現並block 左該ip address（大家唔好為左confirm呢個係咪真而試撞，如果唔係就會block 左你既ip address， 無得再上parachute）。
3）用家可以係建立緊急事件24小時後，上番你登記會員時收到既link 去自行刪除片段，那麼任何人都不會再找到該片段。
4）如果大家仍然擔心，app developer 會考慮係app 既settings 提供一個選項，讓大家自己選擇收到長既link 定係短既link，大家有無意見啊？

quote.msg: 咁段片儲左去邊？

replies.msg:
會去左雲端，所有數據都係美國本土，under 美國jurisdiction

另外，網站仲有詳細既技術性解釋：
“What encryption standards does Parachute use?
All Parachute evidence travels encrypted in a secure pipe with an RSA 2048-bit key signed by a CA. We use a CAA record to prevent unauthorized entities from issuing rogue certificates. We use SSL pinning to ensure malicious governments cannot intercept our data by issuing rogue certificates. We also use HSTS to protect against downgrade attacks. To protect against email spoofing, we sign all our emails with DKIM keys, publish an SPF record, and apply a DMARC policy of "reject" across all our email systems. Organizations have the option to set up E2E encryption, which requires both parties to set up the encryption beforehand, making the data opaque to Parachute, and thus eliminating the need to trust Parachute itself. E2E encryption is only available to organizations who would like to use it, as this feature is not desirable in the normal use case of the Parachute app.”

Where is Parachute data stored?

By default, Parachute data is stored in a proprietary blend of storage locations, which may include the United States. Parachute has no affiliation with any political, economic or social cause. 外國朋友同我講有個app叫parachute喺美國2015年開發，可以㩒一個制/Siri 就立刻通知emergency contact、email、Twitter ，同埋即時地點GPS tracking 、暗中livestream (暗黑mode,個screen係keep住黑色, 唔小心㩒個mon唔會停止錄影）。同普通livestream唔同嘅係如果上網connection無咗，livestream會停錄，但係呢個app可以繼續錄，直至有connection會《成條片無間斷》upload

最重要最重要最重要最重要最重要最重要係個video唔會停直至無電為止，儲存喺雲端，就算電話爛咗都唔會無咗,同埋會自動刪除喺電話所有相關資料，就算攞到手機都del唔到片

外國係用喺打擊犯罪同human trafficking

唔信可search iOS /google for website
我知最好係前線一齊，但係呢個都可以幫少少起碼知道義士喺邊度幾時有危險，同埋有片/錄音留底保障。如果警察無出委任證、暴力又或無講應該講嘅對白先拉人可追究

有一個月free trial 但我朋友email佢地求吓佢地免費開放俾香港人，佢地CEO喺twitter承諾係免費，只要download 咗喺settings “request personal membership” 就會send email 去佢地到，內容可參考以下

“Dear Parachute team, please can I have a personal membership to use the app? Thank you for supporting HK. We really appreciate it. “

至於係咪咁就得我等緊佢地覆但佢地同我朋友講會盡量配合快啲

更新：已覆，得咗，唔知有無用但趁未發夢之前試吓機先

https://parachute.live/app
Parachute by Parachute Labs, Inc.
https://apps.apple.com/hk/app/parachute/id999134752?l=en

—————-
以上為轉載訊息！依家所有普通市民都需要保護自己！全部人都要！

Hi there, I'm a reporter at SCMP and I would like to write a story about the Parachute app.
But first I need to find out if anyone is actually using this app. I was wondering if you could tell me if this app has been downloaded by protesters in Hong Kong and how popular it is?

Sorry for the English, I can't speak Cantonese but I can read Chinese simplified ;)

replies.msg:
Hi, thank you for the message. Currently parachute app is trending #14 overall in HK among free apps, and on 4 Aug (two days ago) it was trending #3. I just found this app useful and shared about it here. I don't think it is solely used by protestors, as many citizens (civilians) who are concerned about personal safety may find the app to be useful.

If you wish, I can help put you in touch with someone from the parachute team, as I have been in contact with them to ask some technical questions from other forum users.

推爆！！！！！
好人一生平安！！！！！

補充資料：
首先感謝手足幫手推，我自己唔係技術L （普通用家，尋日下載），不過儘量回應大家既問題，同埋我都會將你地提出既問題group 埋一次過問番app developer既。

1） 下載：係尋晚凌晨個app 已經update 左，大家唔洗再send email， 只要click一下，如果個手機位置係香港，就可以有free membership（見#404）

2） Android有無：App 負責人回覆左我既email(見下文)，暫時App developer 唔信任Android可以充份保障到大家既資料安全， 所以只係Apple 用家先用到，Android既版本只係美國本土先有得用。
“We have very serious security concerns with Android, and so, at the moment, it is only available inside the United States and only for Organizations that are part of the Parachute Platform (https://parachute.live/platform). Simply put, we cannot trust the safety of Android, especially in Hong Kong. iPhones have a much higher safety standard, and we have an excellent relationship with Apple. Apple has acknowledged Parachute's help in making the iPhone safer: "Security: We would like to acknowledge Marinos Bernitsas of Parachute for their assistance" (https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT209192)”

3） 緊急聯絡人：大家填左緊急聯絡人，記得同對方講番呢件事，係安全情況試用左先，要熟悉點樣用，但係亦唔好濫用呢個free service。

4） 熄mon唔得: 對唔住，我之前以為熄mon 用到，係唔得既！不過個app 本身會黑左你個mon，等其他人唔知道你錄緊。我會跟進下有無可能再upgrade 到即使熄mon 都得。

5） 眾籌：App developer 回覆左我關於眾籌既想法(見下文)，對方話十分願意免費提供服務給香港人，唔需要眾籌，亦唔想願意捐錢既人有任何被追蹤既風險。
“We are deeply thankful for your gesture to raise money for us providing free access. At this point, we are more than happy to provide this for free to HKers, so no need for any crowdfunding. In addition, we would be concerned that any financial transactions could end up being traced, thus creating a risk for anyone donating. So we feel that it is better to hold off at this time。”

6） 答謝：承接5，如果你想答謝App developer，可以寫app reviews, 同埋選擇唔用免費membership， 而係同世界各地其他用家一樣，先免費試用一個月，之後每個月支付月費（大約係$78一個月full version）

7） Data去左邊 ：見下文網站介紹，唔好意思，我唔識翻譯，需要技術巴絲幫手
“What encryption standards does Parachute use?
All Parachute evidence travels encrypted in a secure pipe with an RSA 2048-bit key signed by a CA. We use a CAA record to prevent unauthorized entities from issuing rogue certificates. We use SSL pinning to ensure malicious governments cannot intercept our data by issuing rogue certificates. We also use HSTS to protect against downgrade attacks. To protect against email spoofing, we sign all our emails with DKIM keys, publish an SPF record, and apply a DMARC policy of "reject" across all our email systems. Organizations have the option to set up E2E encryption, which requires both parties to set up the encryption beforehand, making the data opaque to Parachute, and thus eliminating the need to trust Parachute itself. E2E encryption is only available to organizations who would like to use it, as this feature is not desirable in the normal use case of the Parachute app.”

8) 點樣delete video/data：你自己啟用左個app 之後會收到條link, 連結去你自己錄既emergency incidents ，錄製過左24小時之後，可以開番呢條link 自己刪除事件相關資料（係自己刪除！唔係緊急聯絡人刪除），app 會back up 刪除左既 incident 資料至少30日。
“How do I delete a Parachute incident?
When you activate Parachute, we send you an email with the link to the incident, as well as a link that can be used to manage the incident. To delete the incident, just open the manage link on your phone and choose "Delete". For safety, you have to wait 24 hours before deleting an incident. We keep a backup of the deleted incident for a minimum of 30 days. If you would like the deletion of an incident managed differently, please send us an email from the address associated with your account.”

9) 有無保障：作為一個普通用家，只可以提供客觀資料給大家自行判斷，公司係美國公司，地址位於紐約，CEO 背景可見於此：https://marinosb.com/
“Parachute handles highly sensitive data from across the world every day. We take this responsibility very seriously
We never share your data with anyone but your emergency contacts
We never look at any of your data unless you ask us to
We never own your data — all data belongs to you”
詳細terms: https://parachute.live/terms
